name: CODE: EXTERMINATUS
description:
A Co-Op Base Defense Shooter Game wherein you and your brother-in-arms fight to defend the Core on a wasteland against an endless horde of hostile androids.

1.Open Two Instances of the game.

2.Host the game on one and Join the game on the other

3.Prepare yourselves.

Use the Arrow Keys to Rotate the Turret.

Press Spacebar to Fire the Canon
